titleStmt.title: Of the immortality of the soul a sermon preached before the King and Queen at White-Hall upon Palm-Sunday, 1694 / by the Right Reverend Father in God, John Bishop of Norwich.
titleStmt.author: Moore, John, 1646-1714.

notesStmt.note: Half-title: The Bishop of Norwich's sermon of the immortality of the soul.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
